nodes.bodyText: Even though it's a bit longer, I prefer SynchronousInstrument. Also, it would be good to explain in some javadoc what "synchronous" means in this context.

        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * measurements synchronously, user reports individual measurements when they occur.
          
          
            
             * measurements synchronously. That is, when the user reports individual measurements as they occur.
